author: wrowe
msg: I don't seriously expect this solves the segfault ... but it does make
the code more legible, and protects particularly ugly unset values.

author: stas
msg: make sure that make clean removes all autogenerated files

author: wrowe
msg: apr_filepath_merge includes APR_FILEPATH_SECURE_ROOT tests that can
easily (and cross-platform, safely) assure a path is within a given root.

author: wrowe
msg: This patch is insufficient (highlights an existing problem) for OS2 and
Netware, especially, and any other platform with odd native requirements
for the PATH_TRANSLATED variable (where it should look like a filesystem

author: wrowe
msg: There is no errno using apr.  A quick grep reveals a dozen or so files
with serious errno problems, particularly in mod_dav :(
